description: A popular and common medium-sized Amazon. They are mostly green with blue and yellow on the face and a distinctive splash of orange on the leading edge of their wings.
temperament: Can make excellent family pets. They are intelligent, playful, and generally have a stable temperament, though they can go through nippy phases.
loudness: Loud. Can produce loud, harsh screams, especially when excited or seeking attention.
vocalization: Good talkers. They can develop a clear vocabulary and are good at mimicking sounds.
dietaryNeeds: A pelleted base diet with a mix of fresh vegetables is essential. They are prone to weight gain, so limit fatty foods.
healthPointers: Can live up to 50 years. Watch for obesity and related issues. Can be prone to feather destructive behaviors if bored or stressed.
housing: Needs a roomy cage, at least 30"W x 24"D x 48"H. Not recommended for apartments due to noise.
